tool_description: An API  which gives you access to a lot of data about basketball players such as their age, team, name...
title: Basketball Players Data

api_list.name: Get one basketball player with his index
api_list.description: This endpoint will allow you to have all the characteristics of a player by adding the number of his index in the search bar
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://basketball-players-data.p.rapidapi.com/allplayers/{index}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketball-players-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all the basketball players
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the basketball players in the league and continuously updated with new entrants and those retiring
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://basketball-players-data.p.rapidapi.com/allplayers"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketball-players-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
